amendment.description: To require a report on the strategy of the Department of Defense for providing training to members of the Armed Forces on countering improvised explosive devices.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3644 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3644 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Salazar. (consideration: CR S3786; text: CR S3786) To require a report on the strategy of the Department of Defense for providing training to members of the Armed Forces on countering improvised explosive devices.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3644 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3644 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Salazar.
